MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA1 postcode area of Paisley. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:21pm. Our engineers have arrived at the George Street substation and the team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:30pm. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:50pm on Saturday, 03 April 2021
